First of all, great job! I love this mod, the models are great, and the VTOL animations look great!

I'm having an issue with your mod. I take the KF-35, after a while...game crashes everytime. I don't know if its related to mk2\_thunderbolt, or KFAN engine, but the outputlog gives some errors related to them, and with FAR and JSI related. I have lots of other mods installed, including FAR, JSI Rasterpropmonitor, Throtle Control Avionics, and more.

Can your help me with this issue? May I post the outputlog???

Kind regards!

Sure you can post the log, or send me the file in a PM ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) So it only crashes when using a craft with my parts?

> 
> Sure you can post the log, or send me the file in a PM ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) So it only crashes when using a craft with my parts?

I have been testing it for a while. The crash occurs when I use your K-35 craft example. Shortly after the takeoff, the game crashes. I have tried some of the parts by making new crafts, first using the KFAN, then the K-35B VTOL, the MK2 Thunderbolt...and then combining them all. And no issues. 

I also have noticed (maybe its that way, don't know) that actions groups in your craft (K-35) 1 and 3 make the same...and there is no one for toggling the K-35B VTOL mode. Maybe this does not make sense...but I don't know if it's possible that only the craft file could be corrupted.

Thanks for replying so soon Quiznos323, and taking interest in this issue!

I seem to be having a bug occur when using the 1m Razor VTOL Engine where I am not able to switch it into VTOL mode because the button is missing, I tried re installing but to no avail. also the adjustable landing gear seems to be affected as well by this bug

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T05:32:45Z" title="04/20/2015 05:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by KazeNinja**

> 
> I seem to be having a bug occur when using the 1m Razor VTOL Engine where I am not able to switch it into VTOL mode because the button is missing, I tried re installing but to no avail. also the adjustable landing gear seems to be affected as well by this bug

Are you using the included/latest version of FireSpitter? There was someone who had an issue with Adjustable Landing Gear in the past and it was because their FireSpitter plugin was not up to date. That may be linked to your problem with the Razor as well.

Hope that helps, but if not let me know and maybe also send me your output log to look over as well.

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
The VTOL engines use FSAnimateGeneric, so a broken, outdated, or misinstalled firespitter.dll is the most likely culprit.

Does anyone have tried to balance the VTOL engine in this mod by Davon Throttle Control systems?

I can't get it work ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T11:23:02Z" title="04/20/2015 11:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by royying**
Update:deleted and reinstalled the folders for this mod and adjustable landing gear and it still refuses to work. Not entirely sure what else to do.

> 
> Update:deleted and reinstalled the folders for this mod and adjustable landing gear and it still refuses to work. Not entirely sure what else to do.

Reinstall firespitter.dll from [snjo's Github page](http://snjo.github.io/). Click "download plugin" near the top of the page and you will download the DLL. Replace firespitter.dll in GameData/Firespitter/plugins of GameData/Firespitter (whichever exists) with the one you just downloaded. Make sure there is only one copy of firespitter.dll in your GameData folder.

> 
> Does anyone have tried to balance the VTOL engine in this mod by Davon Throttle Control systems?
> I can't get it work ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I actually found a cool and easy way to do it. 

1. Disable all your horisontal engines by setting thrust limiter to 0, or alternatively putting them in second stage

2. Use RCS build aid mod, selected on engines, just make sure all are in VTOL mode.

Add RCS thrust controls to liking

Works like a charm for me. will post craft i managed to make with it
